title: Chicken Karahi
description: A traditional Pakistani chicken curry cooked in a wok.
instructions: Fry onions and garlic until golden.
Add chicken and cook until brown.
Add tomatoes and spices, then simmer.
Garnish with ginger and green chilies.

title: Penne Arrabbiata
description: A spicy Italian pasta dish with tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta in salted water.
Saute garlic and chili flakes in olive oil.
Add tomato sauce and simmer.
Mix pasta with sauce and top with cheese.

title: Beef Kebab Skewers
description: Grilled Turkish-style beef kebabs with spices.
instructions: Mix beef with spices and grated onion.
Shape into long kebabs.
Grill on skewers until cooked through.
Serve with pita bread and salad.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: A garlic butter seafood pasta dish.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Saute garlic in butter, then add shrimp.
Toss pasta in the sauce and garnish with parsley.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich and gooey chocolate dessert.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter.
Whisk eggs and sugar, then mix in flour.
Combine with chocolate and bake for 10 minutes.

title: Lassi
instructions: Blend yogurt, water, and sugar until smooth.
Add ice and blend again.
Garnish with mint leaves.

title: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick Chinese-style fried rice with eggs and vegetables.
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir fry vegetables in sesame oil.
Add rice, eggs, and soy sauce. Mix well.

title: Shepherdâ€™s Pie
description: A comforting Western dish with minced meat and mashed potatoes.
instructions: Cook meat and vegetables in gravy.
Boil and mash potatoes.
Layer meat and potatoes, then bake until golden.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Healthy and tasty grilled salmon with lemon butter.
instructions: Marinate salmon in lemon and garlic.
Grill until flaky and golden.
Serve with butter sauce.

title: Mango Smoothie
description: A tropical mango smoothie perfect for summer.
instructions: Blend mango, milk, and sugar.
Add ice cubes and blend again.
Serve chilled.

title: Paneer Tikka
description: Indian grilled cottage cheese cubes in spices.
instructions: Marinate paneer and vegetables in spices.
Skewer and grill until charred.
Serve with mint chutney.

title: Greek Salad
description: A fresh salad with cucumber, tomatoes, and feta.
instructions: Chop vegetables and toss in olive oil.
Add feta and olives.
Season with oregano and serve.
